title: TY Toys Appreciation
description: Explore the rich history and significance of TY toys, their evolution in the market, the variety of different types available, and effective strategies for starting and managing a successful collection. Gain insights into future trends driven by technological advancements and shifts in global culture.
learningObjectives: Understand the history of TY toys
Identify the different types of TY toys
Develop an understanding of why TY toys became popular
Learn how to start a TY toy collection
Understand how to maintain and grow a TY toy collection

finalProjectDetails.overview: Create a comprehensive plan for starting and growing a TY toy collection, incorporating modern technological influences and an understanding of cultural trends.
requirements: Develop a detailed strategy including budgeting, sourcing, storing, and predicting future trends.
finalProjectDetails.submissionInstructions: Submit your final project via the online student portal in PDF format with accompanying analysis reports.
